name: Rio Rat - Wake Bait
description: The rat is a billed/wake style bait that is a topwater bait.  3 oz 6 inch body, 5 inch tailHooks and Split Rings: Owner ST- 36 size 1, size 6 split rings Soft plastic tail installed with a screwlock piece.

name: Grande Gill Mini Wake Bait
description:
Wakebaits are topwater and subsurface (when "burning" your retreive) swimbait that creates a “V” shaped wake behind it.  The wobble and wake created by the bait fires signals to a bass’ lateral lines, creating interest. Fishing a wakebait in clear open water or around structure imitates a baitfish’s natural escape instinct, which is to head straight to the surface. 

 

:Painted by Trippple P Customs

: Length - 6.75"

: Weight - 3.0 oz
: Hand poured durable/flexible rubber tail
: 3D mouth and gill

: Hooks- Owner ST-36 size 1 (Recommend ST56)

: Split Rings- Owner Hyperwire size 6

name: Guadalupe Glide
description:
The Glide is a slow sink 2 piece bait, and another original bait from HCSB.  This bait has drawing power for big fish no matter if the bite is slow or on fire.   Several different retrieve techniques enable this bait to work it's magic and big fish can't resist!

 

Painted by Trippple P Customs

: 4.0 oz

: 9" long

: Hand poured durable/flexible rubber tail
: 3D mouth and gill

: Hooks- Owner ST-36 size 1 (Recommend ST56)

: Split Rings- Owner Hyperwire size 6

name: Medina Mini Glide
description:
Our 4th bait design for HCSB. This 2 piece mini glide is ideal for conventional rod/reel set ups. This glide has a tighter glide than most keeping the bait in strike zone for a longer period. This is a slow sink style bait.

 

: 2.25 oz

: 6.5 " long

: Hand poured durable/flexible rubber tail
: 3D mouth, gill, and fin

: Hooks- Owner ST-36 size 1

: Split Rings- Owner Hyperwire size 6

: Slow Sink-  rate of fall around 3" every second

name: Lonestar Crankdown (Andry Special)
description:
4 piece billed swimbait! Combination floater and crankdown style bait that dives to depths of 3-4 ft. Swiveling hook hangers and a soft rubber tail for that swimming action.

 

:Painted by Trippple P Customs

: Length 7.75"

: Weight 2.5 oz

: Hand poured durable/flexible rubber tail
: 3D mouth,gill, and fin

: Hooks- Owner ST-36 size 1 (changing hooks sizes can change floating capabilties)

: Split Rings- Owner Hyperwire size 6

name: Longhorn
description: Our new 4 piece big swimming style shad. For those looking to throw a big bait and burn or slow roll this through some big water!
